title: OpenAI Unveils Search Browser In Challenge To Google
description: ChatGPT-maker OpenAI on Tuesday announced an "Atlas" search browser, leveraging its artificial intelligence prowess in a direct challenge to Google Chrome.
content:
ChatGPT-maker OpenAI on Tuesday announced an "Atlas" search browser, leveraging its artificial intelligence prowess in a direct challenge to Google Chrome.

title: AI can spot signs of depression in Reddit posts
description: A new study has found that artificial intelligence (AI) can now spot signs of depression in online writing, and can do so with high accuracy.
content:
